title: League is stuck on installtion/patching.
body: MY LEAGUE HAS BEEN STUCK AT "Scanning files 5"/ SITTING ON 33%. IT SEEMS NOTHING I DO WORKS AND IVE TRIED NEARLY EVERYTHING PLEASE HELP ITS BEEN LIKE THIS FOR WEEKS.

replies.body:
This issue usually happens if your patcher cannot properly establish a good link to our patching servers. There are specific network settings, covered in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), that can be changed to resolve this, so I definitely recommend giving them a go.

Let me know if this helped.
